label: 歯固
対訳語: Presentation of Healthful Food and Drink
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [On the] First, Second, and Thrid Days [of the New Year], the Emperor was served with foods designed to promote longevity (radish, melon, salted trout, venison, boar meat, etc.), and with beverages believed to help prevent illness (toso, a Chinese drink; and other spiced wines and herbal concoctions) (p. 381).
